TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlLink extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體控制項。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計的方式宣告控制，以及定義其屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically declare an control and define its properties. 完整的工作的程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/CS/htmllink.cs#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/CS/htmllinkcs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/VB/htmllinkvb.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/VB/htmllink.vb#2)]

Public Overridable Property Href As String

member this.Href : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中指定連結的 URL 目標。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the link specified in the control.
The URL target of the link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定在指定連結的 URL 目標控制項。The property specifies the URL target of the link specified in the control. 您可以使用這個屬性來指定外部階層式樣式表 (CSS) 的位置。You can use this property to specify the location of an external cascading style sheet (CSS). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定階層式樣式表 (CSS) 儲存在網頁上的相同目錄中的屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property to a cascading style sheet (CSS) that is saved in the same directory as the Web page. 完整的工作的程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/CS/htmllink.cs#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/CS/htmllinkcs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/VB/htmllinkvb.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlLink/VB/htmllink.vb#2)]

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 將 控制項呈現為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會轉譯右括弧 (/ >) 如果 ASP.NET 應用程式設定來呈現 XHTML 相容的標記。The method renders a closing bracket (/>) if the ASP.NET application is configured to render XHTML-compliant markup. 根據預設，ASP.NET 網頁及控制項呈現的 XHTML 1.1 標準與相容的標記。By default, ASP.NET pages and controls render markup that is compatible with the XHTML 1.1 standard. 如需有關如何設定非 XHTML 呈現 ASP.NET 網站的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 設定 ASP.NET 網站中的 XHTML 呈現](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149)。For more information on configuring an ASP.NET Web site for non-XHTML rendering, see [NIB: How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149).

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 將 控制項的屬性轉譯為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法解析屬性，然後再呼叫基底類別的方法。The method resolves the property before calling the base class's method.
